about_the_game:
WELCOME to the Original~BOXiGON!
3D-PUZZLES hand-crafted for you!
Practice color sorting ability up to BOXiGON~MASTER!
Can you unlock the BOX?

FEATURES:
~ 4 SKILL-LEVELS:
- NEWB, PRO, NEO, MASTER.

~ 8 PUZZLE-DIMENSIONS:
- SIMPLEX, FLOWERGARDEN, GRIDPRYZM, RADIASTAR,
- COLORTEMPLE, STARLOCK, COREONE, CORETWO.

~ 12 STEAM-ACHIEVEMENTS.
~ 72 CHALLENGING VARIATIONS to become a BOXiGON~MASTER!


INSTRUCTIONS:
~ ALIGN color tiles with ORBS.
~ Click TILE to SWAP positions.
~ Click ORB to see HINTS.
~ TEXT TIPS show in the lower-left.

ALSO:
~ Look for BONUS~POINTS!
~ Gradually challenging difficulty.
~ And solve your way to BOXiGON~MASTER!

WARNING:
Flashing lights: special care was taken to reduce flashing lights. Warning: low fidelity visual explosions.
Color blindness: game does not include color-blind options. Please let us know if color-blind mode benefits you and we will update.

CONTACT US:
Please give your feedback and support on twitter at BOXiGON.
BOXiGONV2 in the works!

Thank you for playing.

CREDITS:
Image credit: NASA, ESA, and the Hubble Heritage Team (STScI/AURA), derivative use.
Music Soundtrack Credit to: Eric Matayas (see attached link).
DESIGN, DEV & ANM JackFalcon. Dev by falconcrew.
NetCinematics Nash West.
3D Puzzles by Envolveron.

(c) 2018 NetCinematics llc. All rights reserved.

WELCOME to the Original~BOXiGON!
3D-PUZZLES hand-crafted for you!
Practice color sorting ability up to BOXiGON~MASTER!
Can you unlock the BOX?

FEATURES:
~ 4 SKILL-LEVELS:
- NEWB, PRO, NEO, MASTER.

~ 8 PUZZLE-DIMENSIONS:
- SIMPLEX, FLOWERGARDEN, GRIDPRYZM, RADIASTAR,
- COLORTEMPLE, STARLOCK, COREONE, CORETWO.

~ 12 STEAM-ACHIEVEMENTS.
~ 72 CHALLENGING VARIATIONS to become a BOXiGON~MASTER!


INSTRUCTIONS:
~ ALIGN color tiles with ORBS.
~ Click TILE to SWAP positions.
~ Click ORB to see HINTS.
~ TEXT TIPS show in the lower-left.

ALSO:

~ Gradually challenging difficulty.
~ And solve your way to BOXiGON~MASTER!

WARNING:
Flashing lights: special care was taken to reduce flashing lights. Warning: low fidelity visual explosions.
Color blindness: game does not include color-blind options. Please let us know if color-blind mode benefits you and we will update.

name: BOXiGON!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660, AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660, AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUND BLASTER Zx

short_description: The Original~BOXiGON! Can you open the box? 4 Skill Levels, 8 Dimensions, 72 Puzzle Variations. Solve your way to BOXiGON~MASTER!
